title: We’re expanding and looking for a Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager with proven results.
job_overview:
We’re expanding and looking for a Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager with proven results.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month depending on skills

Duties:

Manage campaigns on Google & Facebook.

Optimize performance based on KPIs.

Work fully remote with flexibility.

Requirements:

1+ year experience in paid advertising.

Strong reporting and analysis skills.
